title: [CB][较难]我觉得应该用execute解决
author: 浮尘.
txt_content: Problem:它MC能检测玩家触碰到方块吗？

replies.author: SPGoding
replies.txt_content:
1.13+
execute as @a at @s unless block ~-0.3 ~ ~ minecraft:air run say 西边接触到方块
execute as @a at @s unless block ~+0.3 ~ ~ minecraft:air run say 东边接触到方块
execute as @a at @s unless block ~ ~ ~-0.3 minecraft:air run say 北边接触到方块
execute as @a at @s unless block ~ ~ ~+0.3 minecraft:air run say 南边接触到方块

其中 0.3 是玩家水平方向碰撞箱边长的一半。
